item.title: Patch Notes
item.description: 22w16a A chance to re-live the good old times appears in snapshot 22w16a with the ability to de-fragment a Disc â€“ a new Music Disc, to be precise! This snapshot also comes with even more new music, tweaks to the Allay, and to top it all off some random gameplay events are slightly more predictable. Enjoy! New Features Added new music Added Disc Fragment 5 and Music Disc 5 Four New Music Tracks The new music tracks are called Ancestry, Aerie, Firebugs, and Labyrinthine They play in certain biomes and in the main menu Music Disc 5 A new music disc has been added to the game.

item.title: Reviews
